titleStmt.title: A Christian-testimony born by the people of God in scorn called Quakers in London continued in their patient suffering the taking away of their goods for non-payment of tythes to the parish priests.
titleStmt.author: Field, John, 1652-1723.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC to Field.
Records amounts taken from Quakers for payment of tithes in arrears.
Imperfect: t.p. stained, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
